Apollo, Artemis, Athena, Atlas, Chronus, Demeter, Hephaestus, Hera, Hestia, Minotaur, Pan, Prometheus, Triton, Zeus

  • Method Details

    • setUpGod

      protected void setUpGod​(java.lang.String godName)
      Setup the god for the turn, used only internally. DO NOT USE OUTSIDE!
      Parameters:
      godName - name of the god

    • startTurn

      public void startTurn​(boolean moved_up)
      call the function setUpTurn with the parameters that indicate the number of moves and builds that the player can do
      Parameters:
      moved_up - indicate if athena moved up this turn

    • setUpTurn

      protected void setUpTurn​(int move, int build, boolean moved_up)
      Set the parameters for how many time the player can move and build. DO NOT USE OUTSIDE!
      Parameters:
      move - number of moves that the player can do
      build - number of times that the player can build
      moved_up - true if athena moved up in this turn

    • move

      public int move​(Cell c, Worker w, Map map)
      Move the worker in the desired cell If it is possible to move the worker the moveWorker function is called, otherwise the action is not successful
      Parameters:
      c - cell in which the player want to move the worker
      w - worker that the player want to move
      map - used only for minotaur power
      Returns:
      0 if the operation is successful, -1 if not near or occupied, -2 if already moved this turn, -3 athena block moved up moves, -4 (Artemis) not back to origin, -5 (Minotaur) move out of map, -6 (Apollo/Minotaur) tried to move in friendly occupied cell.

    • build

      public int build​(Cell c, Status b, Worker w)
      call the cell build function based on the god power
      Parameters:
      c - cell
      b - status of the cell
      w - worker that the player want to use to build
      Returns:
      0, 1, 2, 3: the level built if there is no error -1 if cell is not near, is under the worker or is occupied, -2 if the player already build in this turn, -3 (Demeter) if already build in this cell this turn, -4 (Hephaestus) if is a different building slot, -5 (Hesta) if perimetral slot build

    • checkWin

      public boolean checkWin​(Worker w, int completed_tower, boolean is_hera_in_game)
      Check if the player has won the game
      Parameters:
      w - the worker moved is needed
      completed_tower - number of completed tower on the board
      is_hera_in_game - true of false if here is in the game or not
      Returns:
      bool

    • checkLossMove

      public boolean checkLossMove​(Worker w, Map map)
      Used for check if a worker cannot move thus triggering a loss specific cases: Apollo, Athena, Minotaur
      Parameters:
      w - the worker checked
      map - to check the cell near the worker
      Returns:
      true if loss, false if a move is possible

    • checkLossBuild

      public boolean checkLossBuild​(Worker w, Map map)
      Used for check if a worker cannot build thus triggering a loss specific cases: Zeus
      Parameters:
      w - the worker checked
      map - to check the cell near the worker
      Returns:
      true if loss, false if a build is possible

    • AthenaMovedUp

      public boolean AthenaMovedUp()
      Used by turn manager
      Returns:
      if athena moved up

    • getName

      public java.lang.String getName()
      Getter function for the name
      Returns:
      the name of the god used

    • getAllGods

      public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getAllGods()
      return the name of all the gods
      Returns:
      name of the god

    • exists

      public static int exists​(java.lang.String god)
      static method used to check if a god is spelled correctly
      Parameters:
      god - the God we want to check
      Returns:
      1 if it is spelled correctly, -1 otherwise
